meanings.sent1: Her overelaborations in the story made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: The overelaborations in his speech bored the audience.
meanings.sent3: The overelaborations in the recipe made it sound like a science experiment.
meanings.sent4: His overelaborations turned a simple idea into a confusing mess.
meanings.sent5: The overelaborations in the painting overwhelmed the viewer with unnecessary details.

meanings.definition: The act of making something more complicated than necessary
meanings.sent1: The overelaborations in the project caused delays.
meanings.sent2: Avoid overelaborations to keep the process simple.
meanings.sent3: His overelaborations on the topic made everyone laugh at the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The overelaborations in her explanation clouded the main point.
meanings.sent5: The overelaborations in his plan created unnecessary confusion among the team.
